alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Massac; Pulaski; Union (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 5:14PM CDT until July 01 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Union County in southern Illinois... Northeastern Pulaski County in southern Illinois... Northwestern Massac County in southern Illinois... Johnson County in southern Illinois... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 514 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cobden to near Mounds, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vienna, Goreville, Karnak, New Columbia, Lake Of Egypt Area, Cypress, New Burnside, New Grand Chain, Buncombe, Belknap and Simpson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 4 and 30. Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 34 and 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
